name: spectacle-cli
description: CLI for the Spectacle Presentation Framework

scripts.build-examples-cli-md: cd examples/cli-md && node ../../bin/cli.js --title "Spectacle CLI + MD Example" --src slides.md -a build
scripts.build-examples-cli-mdx: cd examples/cli-mdx && node ../../bin/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Babel + Custom Theme Example" -t theme.js -f true --action build --output dist
scripts.build-examples-cli-mdx-babel: cd examples/cli-mdx-babel && node ../../bin/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Babel + Spectacle Slide Example" -q template.js --action build
scripts.build-examples: yarn build-examples-cli-md && yarn build-examples-cli-mdx && yarn build-examples-loader-mdx
scripts.start:cli-md: cd examples/cli-md && node ../../bin/cli.js --title "Spectacle CLI + MD Example" --src slides.md --port 3100
scripts.start:cli-mdx: cd examples/cli-mdx && node ../../bin/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Custom Theme Example" -t theme.js -f true -p 3000
scripts.start:cli-mdx-babel: cd examples/cli-mdx-babel && node ../../bin/cli.js -l "Spectacle CLI + MDX + Babel + Spectacle Slide Example" -q template.js -p 3001
